text: nim'mannu tira durbala sthitiyalli srstisidavanu mattu a balika daurbalyada sthitiyinda nim'mannu saktisali sthitige oydavanu mattu saktisali sthitiyinda nim'mannu punah daurbalyada hagu vrd'dhapyada sthitige oyyuvavanu allahane. Avanu tanicchisiddannu srstisuttane. Avanu ellavannu ballavanu mattu saktanagiddane
